Welcome to MyEverythingDiSC.com!

We’re pleased to introduce interactive learning tools that will help you better understand your DiSC Style - and provide you with personalized tips for working with others. For the best experience possible, we recommend you set up your account profile first.

Provided by: Wiley R&D SuperLongNameExample

Your style is: D

People with this style are direct and tough-minded. They're outspoken with their opinions and aren't afraid to be forceful when they're pushing for results. They tend to challenge people and don't waste time beating around the bush.

Gain insights about your style

You will know your style soon.

In the meantime, find out more about Everything DiSC® by browsing the Learn About DiSC section below.

  • Choose a section on the DiSC map to learn about each style.

  • iD Style

    People with this style are charismatic and adventurous. They describe themselves as risk-takers and like to be at the center of the action. They are not afraid to initiate change and often have an entrepreneurial spirit.

  • i Style

    People with this style are outgoing and enthusiastic. They project a lot of energy and are often the life of the party. They tend to be talkative, love meeting new people, and don't mind showing their emotions.

  • iS Style

    People with this style are cheerful and warm-hearted. They tend to be very trusting of others and are quick to show empathy. They are often described as receptive, welcoming, and easygoing.

  • Si Style

    People with this style are cheerful and warm-hearted. They tend to be very trusting of others and are quick to show empathy. They are often described as receptive, welcoming, and easygoing.

  • S Style

    People with this style are gentle and accommodating. They are patient with others’ mistakes and very considerate of the feelings of the people around them. They tend to be tactful, mild-mannered, and put others' needs above their own.

  • SC Style

    People with this style are reflective and soft-spoken. They're quiet, modest, and spend more time listening than talking. Because they like stability in their world, they often take a cautious, step-by-step approach.

  • CS Style

    People with this style are reflective and soft-spoken. They're quiet, modest, and spend more time listening than talking. Because they like stability in their world, they often take a cautious, step-by-step approach.

  • C Style

    People with this style are analytical and reserved. They take a logical, systematic approach to their work and pride themselves on accuracy. They avoid outward displays of emotion and don't mind solitary work.

  • CD Style

    People with this style are questioning and tend to be on the skeptical side. They pride themselves on strong critical thinking, and they often maintain high standards for themselves and others. They have little patience for incompetence or irrationality.

  • DC Style

    People with this style are questioning and tend to be on the skeptical side. They pride themselves on strong critical thinking, and they often maintain high standards for themselves and others. They have little patience for incompetence or irrationality.

  • D Style

    People with this style are direct and tough-minded. They're outspoken with their opinions and aren't afraid to be forceful when they’re pushing for results. They tend to challenge people and don't waste time beating around the bush.

  • Di Style

    People with this style are charismatic and adventurous. They describe themselves as risk-takers and like to be at the center of the action. They are not afraid to initiate change and often have an entrepreneurial spirit.

Your DiSC style impacts your work relationships.

Visit EverythingDiSC.com to find out how you can discover your own style.

  • Choose a section on the DiSC map to learn about each style.

  • iD Style

    People with this style are charismatic and adventurous. They describe themselves as risk-takers and like to be at the center of the action. They are not afraid to initiate change and often have an entrepreneurial spirit.
